text: what kinds of things are you building with this new beta? what are some interesting examples? It seems like something I should be building but I can't think of a good use case for us

Some things you can try… Do you want your chart to be interactive? If yes, you’ll host it somewhere and use an iframe to display it. 

If you’re not bothered about interactivity, you can create a snapshot of the chart and display as an image.

Hi Andrey! Glad you asked - we have some <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects|sample projects> that might help get the creative juices flowing. We have some awesome developers here who might be able to add what they're building too:slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you for bringing this up! This is something we're working on. Will let you know when there's an update.
